column2: Jack and Jill Poem ~This episode will be a continuation of the episode #10 the use of conjunction ‘And’.This episode will further touch on more examples of the conjunction ‘And’. Finally this lesson will introduce some of the other conjunction words other than the word ‘And’ (so
